snippet: Leaders of the World Anti-Doping Agency declared Russia’s antidoping operation out of compliance Wednesday — a harsh, although expected, blow.
abstract: World Anti-Doping Agency rules Russia's antidoping operation out of compliance; Russia cannot host international events without operating antidoping agency.
lead_paragraph: Leaders of the World Anti-Doping Agency declared Russia’s antidoping operation out of compliance Wednesday — a harsh, although expected, blow.

headline.main: Russia Is Ruled Out of Compliance
headline.print_headline: Russia Is Ruled Out of Compliance
